content.query:
SELECT T1.ITEM, 
T1.REVISION,
T1.MAS_LOC, 
T1.LOCATION, 
T1.OH_QTY, 
T2.STD_COST, 
case  when T2.COST_METHOD like '%STD%' then T1.OH_QTY*T2.STD_COST else T1.OH_QTY*T3.AVG_COST end AS INV_VALUE, 
T3.YTD_DEP_DEM_ISS_QTY, 
T3.YTD_IND_DEM_ISS_QTY, 
T3.YTD_MFG_REC_QTY, 
T3.YTD_PI_ADJ_QTY, 
T3.YTD_PUR_RECEIPTS, 
T4.COMMODITY, 
T4.HPL, 
T2.COST_METHOD, 
T3.AVG_COST,
CAST(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS DATE) RunDate
from GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM T4, 
GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM_LOC T1, 
GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM_CCN T2, 
GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM_ML T3
where T4.ITEM=T1.ITEM 
and T4.REVISION=T1.REVISION 
and T4.ITEM=T2.ITEM 
and T4.REVISION=T2.REVISION 
and T3.CCN=T1.CCN 
and T3.MAS_LOC=T1.MAS_LOC 
and T3.ITEM=T1.ITEM 
and T3.REVISION=T1.REVISION 
and T4.COMMODITY<>'C'
